# Masyopia

This is a [Masyu](https://puzz.link/rules.html?mashu) variant - instead of the pearls being given, there are [Myopia](https://puzz.link/rules.html?myopia)-style clues giving the location of the nearest pearl(s).

[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2025/masyopia1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
